languages.english-overview:
thirty bees is a state of the art e-commerce platform that empowers users to easily start and maintain an e-commerce. We have designed thirty bees around speed and ease of use. We currently have over 170 compatible payment gateways with more coming soon.
thirty bees is released under the Open Software License (OSL 3.0).
languages.english-features:
thirty bees front office comes with every feature you will need to successfully run an ecommerce site. From a quick light-weight front office designed around bootstrap, to an easy to use intuitive back office.
Front-office
Featured products on the home page
Customer contact form
Customer account management with order history
Sales, specials, price reductions, and free product support
Out of stock order capability
Powerful product search
Shipment tracking
MailChimp e-commerce integration
Over 170 available payment gateways
Sell customized products
Totally clean url structure
And many more standard features
Back-office
Easy to use and intuitive
Support for multiple warehouses and shipping locations
Have an unlimited number of products
Multiple shipping options and shipping restrictions
Advanced caching for performance
Ability to easily edit or add
Compatible with unlimited currencies
Translated into over 20 languages
User roles for the back office
Import products easily via CSV
And many more features
